meanings.definition: To divide or distribute by share or portion.
meanings.sent1: She allots the candies equally among her friends.
meanings.sent2: The teacher allots time for each student to present their project.
meanings.sent3: He allots the chores fairly, but always saves the easiest one for himself.
meanings.sent4: The sun allots its warmth to all living creatures, without discrimination.
meanings.sent5: The farmer allots water to each plant, ensuring they all thrive.

meanings.definition: To assign as a portion; set apart.
meanings.sent1: The chef allots a specific amount of ingredients for each dish.
meanings.sent2: The manager allots tasks to each team member based on their strengths.
meanings.sent3: She allots time for relaxation, but always ends up working late.
meanings.sent4: Life allots us challenges to test our strength and resilience.
meanings.sent5: The architect allots space for a garden in every building design.
